@pixelysquid on Twitch

As part of my Twitch stream series and as a member of the Splatoon community, I worked on a bunch of various jawns to help players improve their game and style!

Design System üé®

I designed a digital graphics package and design system for my Twitch stream, and additional graphics for future Splatoon-related events such as tournaments and meetups! Here is just a sample of the assets I use in my jawns:

Current Stages Overlay üèô

I worked on an overlay for OBS that displays the current stages and modes. You can find it online at pixelyunicorn.github.io/splat-overlay. Feel free to embed this page into your streams!

Philips Hue integration üí°

At the beginning of each match, each team is randomly assigned a color. Using the power of OpenCV, I tossed together a python script that detects your team‚Äôs color and changes the ambient lighting of the room to match that color!

TODO: Create a GIF of this in action!

Mixer Overlay üçø

I am currently experimenting with Mixer‚Äôs overlay system and building an interactive overlay that allows viewers to see live results (seconds before they appear on screen), and view previous matches. This will be the subject of a future talk at a Vue or Tech x Gaming meetup near you!

About Me

Hi I'm Rashmika (Scarlet), a web developer, hacker, CTF player, penetration tester and much more, currently studying in Bachelor of Technology at one of the prestigious colleges of India, National Institute of Technology, Warangal. You can find me at @here .
